00032    NptIntegrator::NptIntegrator(Simulation& simulation)
00033     : TwoStepIntegrator(simulation)
00034    {}

00042    /*
00043    * Read time step dt.
00044    */
00045    void NptIntegrator::readParam(std::istream& in)
00046    {
00047       read<double>(in, "dt", dt_);
00048       read<double>(in, "tauT", tauT_);
00049       read<double>(in, "tauP", tauP_);
00050       read<LatticeSystem>(in, "mode", mode_);
00051 
00052       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00053       if (!prefactors_.isAllocated()) {
00054          prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00055       }
00056 
00057    }
00058 
00059    void NptIntegrator::setup()
00060    {
00061       // Exchange atoms, build pair list, compute forces.
00062       setupAtoms();
00063 
00064       simulation().diagnosticManager().setup();
00065 
00066       // Set prefactors for acceleration
00067       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00068       double mass;
00069       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00070       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00071          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00072          prefactors_[i] = dtHalf/mass;
00073       }
00074 
00075       xi_ = 0.0;
00076       eta_ = 0.0;
00077       nu_ = Vector(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00078 
00079       simulation().computeKineticEnergy();
00080       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00081       atomStorage().computeNAtomTotal(domain().communicator());
00082       #endif
00083       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00084          T_target_ = simulation().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00085          P_target_ = simulation().boundaryEnsemble().pressure();
00086          ndof_ = atomStorage().nAtomTotal()*3;
00087       }
00088       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00089       bcast(domain().communicator(), ndof_,0);
00090       #endif
00091    }
00092 
00093    void NptIntegrator::integrateStep1()
00094    {
00095       Vector dv;
00096       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00097       AtomIterator atomIter;
00098 
00099       Simulation& sys = simulation();
00100       sys.computeVirialStress();
00101       sys.computeKineticStress();
00102       sys.computeKineticEnergy();
00103 
00104       double xi_prime;
00105 
00106       if (sys.domain().isMaster()) {
00107          T_target_ = sys.energyEnsemble().temperature();
00108          P_target_ = simulation().boundaryEnsemble().pressure();
00109          T_kinetic_ = sys.kineticEnergy()*2.0/ndof_;
00110          Tensor stress = sys.virialStress();
00111          stress += sys.kineticStress();
00112 
00113          P_curr_diag_ = Vector(stress(0, 0), stress(1,1), stress(2,2));
00114          double P_curr = (1.0/3.0)*stress.trace();
00115 
00116          double W = (1.0/2.0)*ndof_*T_target_*tauP_*tauP_;
00117          double mtk_term = (1.0/2.0)*dt_*T_kinetic_/W;
00118 
00119          // Advance barostat (first half of update)
00120          double V = sys.boundary().volume();
00121          if (mode_ == Cubic) {
00122             nu_[0] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00123             nu_[1] = nu_[2] = nu_[0];
00124          } else if (mode_ == Tetragonal) {
00125             nu_[0] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[0] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00126             nu_[1] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*((1.0/2.0)*(P_curr_diag_[1]+P_curr_diag_[2]) - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00127             nu_[2] = nu_[1];
00128          } else if (mode_  == Orthorhombic) {
00129             nu_[0] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[0] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00130             nu_[1] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[1] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00131             nu_[2] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[2] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00132          }
00133 
00134          // Advance thermostat
00135          xi_prime = xi_ + (1.0/4.0)*dt_/tauT_/tauT_*(T_kinetic_/T_target_ - 1.0);
00136          xi_ = xi_prime + (1.0/4.0)*dt_/tauT_/tauT_*(T_kinetic_/T_target_*exp(-xi_prime*dt_) - 1.0);
00137          eta_ += (1.0/2.0)*xi_prime*dt_;
00138       }
00139 
00140       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00141       bcast(domain().communicator(), xi_,0);
00142       bcast(domain().communicator(), xi_prime,0);
00143       bcast(domain().communicator(), nu_,0);
00144       #endif
00145 
00146       // Precompute loop invariant quantities
00147       mtk_term_2_ = (nu_[0]+nu_[1]+nu_[2])/ndof_;
00148       Vector v_fac = Vector((1.0/4.0)*(nu_[0]+mtk_term_2_),
00149                             (1.0/4.0)*(nu_[1]+mtk_term_2_),
00150                             (1.0/4.0)*(nu_[2]+mtk_term_2_));
00151       exp_v_fac_ = Vector(exp(-v_fac[0]*dt_),
00152                           exp(-v_fac[1]*dt_),
00153                           exp(-v_fac[2]*dt_));
00154       Vector exp_v_fac_2 = Vector(exp(-(2.0*v_fac[0]+(1.0/2.0)*xi_prime)*dt_),
00155                                   exp(-(2.0*v_fac[1]+(1.0/2.0)*xi_prime)*dt_),
00156                                   exp(-(2.0*v_fac[2]+(1.0/2.0)*xi_prime)*dt_));
00157       Vector r_fac = Vector((1.0/2.0)*nu_[0],
00158                             (1.0/2.0)*nu_[1],
00159                             (1.0/2.0)*nu_[2]);
00160       Vector exp_r_fac = Vector(exp(r_fac[0]*dt_),
00161                                 exp(r_fac[1]*dt_),
00162                                 exp(r_fac[2]*dt_));
00163 
00164       //Coefficients of sinh(x)/x = a_0 + a_2 * x^2 + a_4 * x^4 + a_6 * x^6 + a_8 * x^8 + a_10 * x^10
00165       const double a[] = { double(1.0), double(1.0/6.0), double(1.0/120.0), 
00166                            double(1.0/5040.0), double(1.0/362880.0), double(1.0/39916800.0)};
00167 
00168       Vector arg_v = Vector(v_fac[0]*dt_, v_fac[1]*dt_, v_fac[2]*dt_);
00169       Vector arg_r = Vector(r_fac[0]*dt_, r_fac[1]*dt_, r_fac[2]*dt_);
00170 
00171       sinhx_fac_v_ = Vector(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00172       Vector sinhx_fac_r = Vector(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00173 
00174       Vector term_v = Vector(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00175       Vector term_r = Vector(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00176 
00177       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
00178          sinhx_fac_v_ += Vector(a[0]*term_v[0],
00179                                 a[1]*term_v[1],
00180                                 a[2]*term_v[2]);
00181          sinhx_fac_r += Vector(a[0]*term_r[0],
00182                                a[1]*term_r[1],
00183                                a[2]*term_r[2]);
00184          term_v = Vector(term_v[0] * arg_v[0] * arg_v[0],
00185                          term_v[1] * arg_v[1] * arg_v[1],
00186                          term_v[2] * arg_v[2] * arg_v[2]);
00187          term_r = Vector(term_r[0] * arg_r[0] * arg_r[0],
00188                          term_r[1] * arg_r[1] * arg_r[1],
00189                          term_r[2] * arg_r[2] * arg_r[2]);
00190       }
00191 
00192       // 1st half of NPT
00193       Vector vtmp;
00194       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00195       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00196          prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00197 
00198          dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00199          dv[0] = dv[0] * exp_v_fac_[0]*sinhx_fac_v_[0];
00200          dv[1] = dv[1] * exp_v_fac_[1]*sinhx_fac_v_[1];
00201          dv[2] = dv[2] * exp_v_fac_[2]*sinhx_fac_v_[2];
00202 
00203          Vector& v = atomIter->velocity();
00204          v[0] = v[0] * exp_v_fac_2[0] + dv[0];
00205          v[1] = v[1] * exp_v_fac_2[1] + dv[1];
00206          v[2] = v[2] * exp_v_fac_2[2] + dv[2];
00207 
00208          vtmp[0] = v[0]*exp_r_fac[0] *sinhx_fac_r[0];
00209          vtmp[1] = v[1]*exp_r_fac[1] *sinhx_fac_r[1];
00210          vtmp[2] = v[2]*exp_r_fac[2] *sinhx_fac_r[2];
00211 
00212          Vector& r = atomIter->position();
00213          r[0] = r[0]*exp_r_fac[0]*exp_r_fac[0] + vtmp[0]*dt_;
00214          r[1] = r[1]*exp_r_fac[1]*exp_r_fac[1] + vtmp[1]*dt_;
00215          r[2] = r[2]*exp_r_fac[2]*exp_r_fac[2] + vtmp[2]*dt_;
00216       }
00217 
00218       // Advance box lengths
00219       Vector box_len_scale = Vector(exp(nu_[0]*dt_),
00220                                     exp(nu_[1]*dt_),
00221                                     exp(nu_[2]*dt_));
00222 
00223       Vector L = sys.boundary().lengths();
00224       L[0] *= box_len_scale[0];
00225       L[1] *= box_len_scale[1];
00226       L[2] *= box_len_scale[2];
00227 
00228       // Update box lengths
00229       sys.boundary().setOrthorhombic(L);
00230    }
00231 
00232    void NptIntegrator::integrateStep2()
00233    {
00234       Vector dv;
00235       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00236       AtomIterator atomIter;
00237 
00238       Vector v_fac_2 = Vector((1.0/2.0)*(nu_[0]+mtk_term_2_),
00239                               (1.0/2.0)*(nu_[1]+mtk_term_2_),
00240                               (1.0/2.0)*(nu_[2]+mtk_term_2_));
00241       Vector exp_v_fac_2 = Vector(exp(-v_fac_2[0]*dt_),
00242                                  exp(-v_fac_2[1]*dt_),
00243                                  exp(-v_fac_2[2]*dt_));
00244 
00245       double v2_sum = 0.0;
00246 
00247       // 2nd half of NPT
00248       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00249       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00250          prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00251          dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00252          dv[0] = dv[0] * exp_v_fac_[0]*sinhx_fac_v_[0];
00253          dv[1] = dv[1] * exp_v_fac_[1]*sinhx_fac_v_[1];
00254          dv[2] = dv[2] * exp_v_fac_[2]*sinhx_fac_v_[2];
00255 
00256          Vector& v = atomIter->velocity();
00257          v[0] = v[0] * exp_v_fac_2[0] + dv[0];
00258          v[1] = v[1] * exp_v_fac_2[1] + dv[1];
00259          v[2] = v[2] * exp_v_fac_2[2] + dv[2];
00260 
00261          // total up 2*kinetic energy
00262          double mass = simulation().atomType(atomIter->typeId()).mass();
00263          v2_sum += v.dot(v)*mass;
00264       }
00265      
00266       // Advance thermostat (second half of update)
00267       double T_prime;
00268       double xi_prime;
00269       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00270       //reduce vs_sum
00271       domain().communicator().Reduce(&v2_sum, &T_prime, 1, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM,0);
00272       #endif
00273 
00274       if (domain().isMaster()) {
00275          T_prime /= ndof_;
00276          xi_prime = xi_ + (1.0/4.0)*dt_/tauT_/tauT_*(T_prime/T_target_ - 1.0);
00277          xi_ = xi_prime + (1.0/4.0)*dt_/tauT_/tauT_*(T_prime/T_target_*exp(-xi_prime*dt_) - 1.0);
00278          eta_ += (1.0/2.0)*xi_prime*dt_;
00279       }
00280 
00281       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00282       bcast(domain().communicator(), xi_prime,0);
00283       #endif
00284 
00285       // Rescale velocities
00286       double exp_v_fac_thermo = exp(-(1.0/2.0)*xi_prime*dt_);
00287       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00288       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00289          atomIter->velocity().multiply(atomIter->velocity(), exp_v_fac_thermo);
00290       }
00291 
00292       Simulation& sys = simulation();
00293       sys.velocitySignal().notify();
00294       sys.computeKineticStress(); 
00295       sys.computeKineticEnergy(); 
00296       sys.computeVirialStress(); 
00297 
00298       // Advance barostat
00299       if (sys.domain().isMaster()) {
00300          T_kinetic_ = sys.kineticEnergy()*2.0/ndof_;
00301          Tensor stress = sys.virialStress();
00302          stress += sys.kineticStress();
00303 
00304          P_curr_diag_ = Vector(stress(0,0), stress(1,1), stress(2,2));
00305          double P_curr = (1.0/3.0)*stress.trace();
00306 
00307          double W = (1.0/2.0)*ndof_*T_target_*tauP_*tauP_;
00308          double mtk_term = (1.0/2.0)*dt_*T_kinetic_/W;
00309 
00310          double V = sys.boundary().volume();
00311          if (mode_ == Cubic) {
00312             nu_[0] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00313             nu_[1] = nu_[2] = nu_[0];
00314          } else if (mode_ == Tetragonal) {
00315             nu_[0] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[0] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00316             nu_[1] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*((1.0/2.0)*(P_curr_diag_[1]+P_curr_diag_[2]) - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00317             nu_[2] = nu_[1];
00318          } else if (mode_  == Orthorhombic) {
00319             nu_[0] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[0] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00320             nu_[1] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[1] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00321             nu_[2] += (1.0/2.0)*dt_*V/W*(P_curr_diag_[2] - P_target_) + mtk_term;
00322          }
00323       }
00324 
00325       #if 0
00326       // Output conserved quantity
00327       sys.computePotentialEnergies();
00328       if (sys.domain().isMaster()) {
00329          std::ofstream file;
00330          file.open("NPT.log", std::ios::out | std::ios::app);
00331          double thermostat_energy = ndof_ * T_target_ * (eta_ + tauT_*tauT_*xi_*xi_/2.0);
00332          double W = (1.0/2.0)*ndof_*T_target_*tauP_*tauP_;
00333          double V = sys.boundary().volume();
00334          double barostat_energy = W*(nu_[0]*nu_[0]+ nu_[1]*nu_[1] + nu_[2]*nu_[2]);
00335          double pe = sys.potentialEnergy();
00336          double ke = sys.kineticEnergy();
00337          file << Dbl(V,20)
00338               << Dbl(pe,20)
00339               << Dbl(ke,20)
00340               << Dbl(barostat_energy,20)
00341               << Dbl(thermostat_energy,20)
00342               << std::endl;
00343          file.close();
00344       }
00345       #endif
00346 
00347       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00348       // Broadcast barostat and thermostat state variables
00349       bcast(domain().communicator(), xi_, 0);
00350       bcast(domain().communicator(), nu_, 0);
00351       #endif
00352 
00353   }
00354 
00355 }
00356 #endif
